data.taskTitle: Expand IDE name generation word lists
Expand IDE name generation word lists
data.approach: 1. Expand ADJECTIVES array to ~70+ words (nature/geography themed), 2. Expand NOUNS array to ~70+ words (nature/geography themed), 3. Add collision checking against existing agent names in database via am-agents, 4. Test the expanded name generation

data.taskTitle: Expand IDE name generation word lists
summary: Expanded ADJECTIVES from 56 to 72 words (Temperature, Light, Size, Quality, Weather categories)
Expanded NOUNS from 64 to 72 words (Water, Land, Vegetation, Coastal, Atmospheric, Geological categories)
Added collision checking against ALL agents in database (not project-filtered)
Case-insensitive comparison prevents duplicates like SwiftRiver vs swiftriver
Fallback mechanism adds numeric suffix if 100 attempts all collide
Currently 87.4% of combinations available (4,531 out of 5,184)

suggestedTasks.title: Implement comprehensive name collision prevention strategy
suggestedTasks.description: Create a robust algorithm to ensure 100% unique agent names across the system. This should include checking against existing database entries, recently retired names, and potential future reservations. Develop a systematic approach to handle potential naming conflicts and generate truly unique identifiers.
suggestedTasks.reason: Current implementation may still have edge cases in name generation

suggestedTasks.title: Optimize name generation word list selection algorithm
suggestedTasks.description: Review and refactor the current word list selection mechanism to ensure optimal randomness and distribution. Implement weighted selection if needed to prevent predictable name patterns and improve overall naming diversity.
suggestedTasks.reason: Improve name generation randomness and uniqueness

patterns: Use extensive word lists for name generation
Implement collision checking against existing names
gotchas: Large word lists may impact performance
Ensure consistent naming convention across system

documentationNeeds: Document expanded word list sources and selection method
